reviews.review: While this game is one of the most buggy games you will ever play, there are plenty of ups to it, just riding the highs of escaping, running down survivors, and many more things. It is hard to start and get into, but once you are *ahem* hooked... You will realize that it is one of the most fun games out there imo.
Very addictive and fun game, reasonably well balanced PVP survival horror game. great way to kill 10 minutes or 10 hours.

This one is kinda mixed for me, but I guess overall its an alright game

If you're the type of person however who expects lots of replay value and endless amount of fun then I would suggest avoiding this game

Its possible for killers to end you within the first few minutes of a game, and the game is quite punishing when it comes to chances. If you've been hooked once and you're hooked after that, then its game over for you. There is no alternative gameplay style to keep you playing, you just have to find another game (in which at this day and age, the game takes its time to offer)

It *is* possible to overcome obstacles, but It requires a lot of practice which I would be fine with if the game was more forgiving for me to experiment. It doesnt help as well that random team mates can either be useless, depending on your luck

Obviously at that point, playing with friends is highly recommended. Mic's also enchance the experience 

If you've read this and disagree with any of these points then I'd stay away from this one, however if you're the type of player that is determined to put in all the wait time and effort then go for it. I hope you have more fun than I did

If I were to say anything positive, the exclusive characters are cool to play with and the setting is really well done. I find getting chased to be terrifying and enjoyable, its just a shame that the punishment can happen extreamly often

Good gameplay, very fun to play with friends and also alone. You can customize your perks for each charakter and there are a lot of challenges to complete.

**recommended**
This game is very fun. However sometimes it can be the worst game you can play, just depends on the killer or survivors you get. Overall fun and I would recommend playing with friends
Difficult cat vs mouse game but it is definitely worth playing

Dead by Daylight is a fun game, especially for playing with/against friends. I personally love making my own events with the game since it allows me to do so without having to pay too much for prizes or servers to use.

√â um Jogo muito bom e nada entediante, tendo uma gameplay completa e muito satisfat√≥ria , o sistema de add-ons e perks permite uma experiencia diversificada com um mesmo personagem, o que possibilita v√°rios tipos de combina√ß√µes. 
   √â melhor aproveitado quando jogado com amigos, pois a intera√ß√£o entre os players gera uma melhor comunica√ß√£o e gameplay mais divertida. Al√©m de tamb√©m ter um numero diversificado de personagens que se adaptam ao estilo de jogo do player.  Mais como todo jogo possui bugs, entretanto nenhum que possa vir a estraga a experiencia. 
   Possui uma gameplay unica ao qual mistura o terror de jogos cl√°ssicos, bem como traz personagens ic√¥nicos do terror como o Leatherface, Michael Myers e freddy Kruger com o multiplayer online. Demais por ter comados simples √© acess√≠veis a jogadores de todos os tipos, desde jogadores competitivos a players casuais. Como tamb√©m tem muitos mapas a fim de promover partidas diferenciadas umas das outras. 
   Em suma √© um jogo que vale a pena, por proporcionar uma experiencia divertida e um valor acess√≠vel a todos.

[h1]Pros/good features:[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Fun game where you can choose to play as a killer or survivor. Different abilities/powers for each!
    [*]Many DLCs to choose from and an assortment of in-game cosmetic options to play with
    [*]Mostly balanced gameplay with a good stream of updates and fixes on newer problems.
    [*]Unlockable story bites and logs with challenge completion.(some questionably TOO hard with current queue/toxic state)
    [*]The game features licensed characters and content from various famous horror franchises/movies.
[/list]

[h1]Cons/ BAD features:[/h1]
[list]
    [*]New additions/DLCs are met with extreme bugs which break the game (usually fixed soon after)
    [*]Tedious queue waiting time.
    [*]Lack of foul language filter or in-game blocking function. Reporting players does little without video evidence to back you up. (I recommend everyone to record gameplay regardless. It's the only way your voice will be heard on that front.)
    [*]Toxic players and no way to stop queueing with them. Prepare to receive death threats and insults. There is no escape, indeed.
    [*]Completing challenges for rift/tome encourage camping/bad gameplay/terrible manners/frustration for fellow survivors or the killer.
    [*]It will take you FOREVER to get anything worthwhile. I have roughly 60 hours in this game so far and it feels impossible to properly level characters/killers with the current ranking system. Prepare to be very disappointed early in the game~
[/list]

There are probably more that I have neglected to add but I suppose that's part of the fun of trying the game yourself.

[h1]In my own suggestion to this game...[/h1]
Add a category system similar to other games like RE:6 which they can change in the settings at any time. Have players choose either

[b]Play to Win[/b]
or
[b]Play for Fun[/b]

Play to Win offers competition, higher risk with higher rewards. Maybe even exclusive perks or items you can only use in this category (can't take it with you to the other category). Better chance for survivors and killers to be queued with like-minded individuals who take the game seriously/play for strategy.

Play for Fun for those who just want to play for fun or completion of rift/tome, not the most BP or bragging rights. Better chances for survivors or killers looking to have fun and perhaps practice techniques (especially if they are new at playing a certain killer or survivor)(without constant death threats, harrassment, bullying or otherwise "toxic" attacks)

Bonus points if a better block/ban system is added when detecting death threats, toxic-esque behavior or just general ill-tempered players.

MORE bonus points if the queue lists players based on language instead of region. I'm not sure of the full story about why it is the way it is currently... but it seems like there are a lot of issues with queues being VERY slow. I think it has something to do with region locks but I could be mistaken.
